fields.headline: Quick getaways
fields.bodyText: Under £200 Seven nights half board in Mayrhofen, Austria's prettiest and livliest village, with Crystal Holidays (0870 848 7000). Departing 3 or 10 July for the three star Crystal-managed Haus St Lukas, with charter flights from Gatwick, Birmingham, Bristol and Manchester to Salzburg. The cost is a mere £179. The 17th century Cotswold House Hotel in Chipping Campden, Gloucestershire, is marking the opening of five new rooms with special rates and a complimentary dinner on a two night midweek stay up to the end of July. Rooms are from £125 including breakfast. Call hotel on 01386 840330. From bustiers to brasseries, the Paris flea market is celebrating a century of lingerie. Two nights' three-star B&B at the Hotel Atlanta Frochot, Montmartre, with return Eurostar fares is available for £125 from Eurotours (0870 380 7380) until 30 June. Under £300 Three bedroomed Villa Popy near Rethymnon in Crete is still available for a week from 25 June through Iglu (020 8544 6420). The price has been halved to £299 (based on six sharing) including charter flights from Gatwick and car hire, and comes with a private church in the grounds should you feel the need. Aspiring chefs can spend three nights' half-board at the Val au Cesne auberge in Normandy with four hours' tuition from chef Eric Chevalier. The cost: £273, leaving on Wednesdays until the end of July with Hoverspeed Dover-Calais crossing for passengers and car. Inntravel's Shortbreaks (01653 629001). Under £500 Depart 29 June for seven nights at the self-catering Bisaccia Villa apartments on the north coast of Sardinia within walking distance of Baia where the price has been reduced to £449 (a saving of £246). Includes charter flights from Gatwick to Olbia and car hire. Citalia (020 8686 5533). Laskarina (01629 822203) has two weeks for the price of one for properties on the Greek island of Ikaria during June and July. For example, Panorama Studios for £460 leaving Gatwick or Manchester on 4 July. Under £600 Classic Collection Holidays (0870 787 3377) has seven nights B&B at the five star Quinta da Bela Vista above Funchal in Madeira for £566 (saving £42). Departures up to 27 July, BA flights from Gatwick and taxi transfers included. Baden Baden, in the Black Forest of Germany, hides spas, beautiful walks and historic scenery. Stay for four nights' B&B in a three-star hotel with flights to Stuttgart and car hire from £509 from London (£547 Birmingham, £541 Edinburgh) through the German Travel Centre (020 8429 2900) up until 31 August. Under £700 Still a few places left on Cox and Kings (020 7873 5000) 'Rococo to Art Nouveau' art treasures tour based in Nancy, France. Three nights at the three star Hotel Mecure Stanislas, Air France flights from Gatwick, breakfasts and one dinner included for £660. The tour is accompanied by art and design lecturer Anne Anderson. Under £1,100 Hang out at the birthplace of the hammock, at the Mexican jungle retreat of Hacienda Katanchel. A week with breakfast, scheduled flights and transfers is £1,050 with Steppes Latin America (01285 885333) until the end of September. · Prices are per head; all travel is return.
